content: lion brand pattern # 60783ad skill level easy level 2 lion® cashmere blend article #270 *discontinued* for rose center 4 colors 84 yards each *shown in light pink cream navy black * plus ruffles® article #410 *discontinued* for rose 2 colors 21 yards each *shown in black & cream * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm exact gauge is not essential to this project rose make 12 rose center make 12 sew centers onto flowers join flowers with crocheted chains to finish
